description: Keep your little one entertained with a set of festive puzzles featuring furry felines in our “Christmas Kitties” jigsaw by artist Bridget Voth! Give your preschooler the gift of mastering important skills with our “Christmas Kitties” 24-piece puzzles and watch them delight in their accomplishment as each sturdy piece clicks into place! One kitty cat is indoors, nibbling on a sugar cookie, while the other has a bundle brimming with presents. Both feature cute mice joining in the fun! Puzzles help develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving through repeated practice while delivering ho ho holiday fun! Each of these two 24-piece puzzles have extra-large, durable pieces little hands can easily hold on to for lots of repeat fun, and come with handy, full-size picture guides! Clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s tight, interlocking fit provide a pleasurable puzzling experience for children and their adult helpers alike. Our Perfect Age Fit criteria ensures this puzzle is fun and educational for ages 4 and up!
